content: >>> 60 g of super bulky yarn small amount of aran yarn brown craft stuffing 9 mm and 4 mm crochet hook tapestry needle scissors sample crocheted in malabrigo rasta & lion brand heartland @halfcaffcrochet ravelry etsy youtube instagram facebook harvest pumpkin instructions >>> pumpkin larger hook stem smaller hook gauge is not critical for this project leaving a long tail 12-18 /30-45 leaving a long tail cm make a slip knot and chain 15 make a slip knot and chain 8 you will need to know these techniques and stitches row 1 starting in second chain row 1 starting in second  chain from hook slip_stitch in back chain from hook slip_stitch loop of each stitch to end of in back loop of each  slip_stitch in back loop row chain 1 turn 14 stitch to end of row  whip stitch chain 1 turn 7  running stitch row 2 slip_stitch in the back loop of every stitch row 2 slip_stitch in the numbers in parenthesis at the end of chain 1 turn 14 back loop of every stitch row indicate stitch count chain 1 turn 7 r epeat row 2 until you have a this pattern is worked flat working rectangle twice as long as it is wide repeat row 2 until you have and turning about 35 row end on an odd row a square end on an odd row take care not to slip_stitch too tightly finish off leaving an extra long tail finish off leaving a long tail pumpkin sewing and assembly 1 fold your rectangle in half so the short ends meet sew up the side with a whip stitch using one of the long tails don t finish off 2 now you have a tube with the same yarn sew a running stitch around nearest open end pull tight to close finish off 3 now you have a bowl stuff the bowl thread needle with unused yarn tail sew a running stitch around open end pull tight to close don t finish off 4 now you have a ball pull yarn down thru center of ball and back up again pull tightly to draw both sides in at the center to shape pumpkin finish off stem repeat steps one and two above sew open end to pumpkin
